div.h3: List of Value Sets created for the USLabOrder and USLabResult Implementation

li.a: USLABDOEvent - Information about an event that occurred to a diagnostic order that corresponds to the USLabOrder Use Cases
USLabNameUse - The name types for US Laboratory ordering and reporting in ambulatory care setting
USLabPHNameUse - The name types for US Laboratory reporting to Public Health
USPSState - Two letter USPS alphabetic codes
USFIPSCounty - FIPS codes for US counties and county equivalent entities
USLabObsInterpretation - Codes identifying interpretations of observations
USLabUCUM - UCUM Codes for units of measure
USLabSpecimenRejection - Specimen Rejection Reasons codes for identifying why a test was not performed
USLabObservationKind - Code to classify the kind of observation in Observation.value[x]
USLabSpecimenType - Codes to describe the Specimen
USLabSpecimenBodySite - Codes to describe the Specimen Collection Body site

text.value: List of Value Sets created for the USLabOrder and USLabResult Implementation

display.value: USLABDOEvent - Information about an event that occurred to a diagnostic order that corresponds to the USLabOrder Use Cases
USLabNameUse - The name types for US Laboratory ordering and reporting in ambulatory care setting
USLabPHNameUse - The name types for US Laboratory reporting to Public Health
USPSState - Two letter USPS alphabetic codes
USFIPSCounty - FIPS codes for US counties and county equivalent entities
USLabObsInterpretation - Codes identifying interpretations of observations
USLabUCUM - UCUM Codes for units of measure
USLabSpecimenRejection - Specimen Rejection Reasons codes for identifying why a test was not performed
USLabObservationKind - Code to classify the kind of observation in Observation.value[x]
USLabSpecimenType - Codes to describe the Specimen
USLabSpecimenBodySite - Codes to describe the Specimen Collection Body site
